leaflet.constituency: Jarrow Constituency Incorporating Hebburn, Cleadon, East Boldons, Fellgate, Primrose, West Park, Pelaw, Bill Quay, Wardley & Leam Lane

messages.title: You can make a difference this year vote on 4th May

issues.governance: Stephen criticises the local Labour party's record over the past 30 years.
issues.health: MPs including Stephen Hepburn voted to give Nurses a 1% pay rise.

leaflet.personalStatement: Steve Harrison is standing as UKIP's candidate for the General Election May 7th 2015 because he wants to tackle the issues that plague the Jarrow Constituency.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet discusses the incumbent MP's voting record and criticizes the local Labour party's governance over the last 30 years. It also mentions a specific policy regarding health, referencing the pay rise given to nurses.
